_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
    records: pv![the pv to write],
    relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
  )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(record: _, relationship: _),
    fv!item,
    a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!nonWritableRelationships,
      default: difference(
        rule!AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord(records: fv!item),
        ri!writableRelationships
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e877-159f-8000-9c05-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getFileContentFromZip
_a-0000e877-159f-8000-9c05-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  local!fileData: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!fileNames,
      expression: a!localVariables(
        local!output: readzipfilecontent(
          zipDocument: ri!zipDocument,
          zipEntry: ri!baseFilePath & fv!item
        ),
        /*Updating the output with fileName here to identify multiple file reads*/
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(local!output, "fileName", fv!item)
      )
    ),
    expression: if(
      fv!item.success = true(),
      fv!item,
      a!map(
        fileName: fv!item.fileName,
        success: false(),
        result: a!map(body: ""),
        error: a!map(
          title: "The requested file cannot be found",
          message: "Either there might be a typo in file name or the requested file is not present in the zip document",
          detail: "File Not Found"
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!fileData,
    expression: a!map(
      fileName: fv!item.fileName,
      success: fv!item.success,
      result: a!map(body: fv!item.content),
      error: fv!item.error
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ebbc-9d1b-8000-9d4f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!clauseText,
  whenTrue: or(
    search("Endofclause", fv!value) <> 0,
    search("clause:", fv!value) <> 0,
    search("following clauses",fv!value) <> 0,
  ),
  then: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_TYPE_CLAUSE,
  whenTrue: or(
    search("Endofprovision", fv!value) <> 0,
    search("provision:", fv!value) <> 0,
    search("provision at",fv!value) <> 0
  ),
  then: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_TYPE_PROVISION,
  default: null
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e86e-0144-8000-9c00-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!value),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: "No documents",
        style: "EMPHASIS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!value,
        expression: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: rule!AS_CO_UT_createDocumentDownloadLinkLabel(document(fv!item, "name")),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentDownloadLink"(document: fv!item)
          ),
          if(fv!isLast, null, char(10))
        }
      )
    ),
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibility
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fileUploadField_v1"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: ri!readOnly
    ),
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    target: ri!target,
    fileNames: ri!fileNames,
    fileDescriptions: ri!fileDescriptions,
    maxSelections: ri!maxSelections,
    value: ri!value,
    saveInto: ri!saveInto,
    required: ri!required,
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      array: {
        ri!validations,
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!allowedFileSize),
          null,
          rule!AS_CO_UT_fileSizeValidation(
            maxAllowedFileSizeInBytes: ri!allowedFileSize,
            fileSizesToCheck: fv!files.size
          )
        ),
        if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!allowedFileExtensions),
          null,
          if(
            contains(
              ri!allowedFileExtensions,
              fv!files.extension
            ),
            null,
            concat(
              "Files uploaded must be of the following type(s):" & " ",
              rule!AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence(
                list: ri!allowedFileExtensions,
                finalSeparator: "or"
              )
            )
          )
        )
      }
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    buttonStyle: ri!buttonStyle,
    buttonSize: ri!buttonSize,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibility
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

AS_GCM_UT_mapImportExcelToClause
_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
  type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_Clause_Helper?list',
  value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!clauseImportData.data,
    expression: a!localVariables(
      local!clauseImportData: fv!item,
      local!clauseFieldValues: rule!AS_CO_UT_dynamicDictionary(
        fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: rule!AS_GCM_BL_importClauseFromExcelFieldsList(bundle: ri!bundle).field,
          expression: {
            field: fv!item,
            value: local!clauseImportData[displayvalue(
              fv!item, touniformstring(ri!excelColumns.clauseField.field), ri!excelColumns.excelHeader, null
            )]
          }
        )
      ),
      'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_Clause_Helper'(
        clauseId: null,
        clauseNumber: local!clauseFieldValues.clauseNumber,
        clauseTitle: local!clauseFieldValues.clauseTitle,
        alternateValue: local!clauseFieldValues.alternateValue,
        deviation: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.deviation,
          { "Yes", "No" },
          { true, false },
          null
        ),
        effectiveDate: local!clauseFieldValues.effectiveDate,
        ucfSection: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.ucfSection.sectionLabel,
          ri!refSection[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionLabel],
          ri!refSection,
          null
        ),
        commercialSection: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
          records: ri!refSection,
          fieldValuePairs: {
            a!map(
              field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.contractFormatId,
              value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_FORMAT_COMMERCIAL
            ),
            a!map(
              field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionLabel,
              value: local!clauseFieldValues.commercialSection.sectionLabel
            )
          }
        ),
        constructionSection: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
          records: ri!refSection,
          fieldValuePairs: {
            a!map(
              field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.contractFormatId,
              value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_FORMAT_CONSTRUCTION
            ),
            a!map(
              field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionLabel,
              value: local!clauseFieldValues.constructionSection.sectionLabel
            )
          }
        ),
        refSource: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.refSource.refLabel,
          ri!refSource[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refLabel],
          ri!refSource,
          null
        ),
        refType: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.refType.refLabel,
          ri!refType[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refLabel],
          ri!refType,
          null
        ),
        refFormat: if(
          a!isNullOrEmpty(
            local!clauseFieldValues.refFormat.refLabel
          ),
          null,
          a!defaultValue(
            value: displayvalue(
              local!clauseFieldValues.refFormat.refLabel,
              ri!refFormat[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDescription],
              ri!refFormat,
              null
            ),
            default: displayvalue(
              local!clauseFieldValues.refFormat.refLabel,
              ri!refFormat[recordType!AS GCM R Data.refLabel],
              ri!refFormat,
              null
            )
          )
        ),
        fillIn: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.fillIn,
          { "Yes", "No" },
          { true, false },
          null
        ),
        editable: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.editable,
          { "Yes", "No" },
          { true, false },
          null
        ),
        prescriptionNumber: local!clauseFieldValues.prescriptionNumber,
        prescriptionText: local!clauseFieldValues.prescriptionText,
        clauseText: local!clauseFieldValues.clauseText,
        isActive: displayvalue(
          local!clauseFieldValues.isActive,
          { "Active", "Inactive" },
          { true, false },
          null
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      required: ri!required,
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,

    )
  )
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_VD_duplicateValidationForClauseNumber
_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!clauseDetails: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getRefClause(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseNumber),
    logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "AND",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!clauseNumber,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseNumber)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!alternateValue,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!alternateValue)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue,
          operator: "is null",
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!alternateValue)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.deviation,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!deviation,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!deviation)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId,
          operator: "<>",
          value: ri!clauseId,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId)
        )
      }
    ),
    fields: {
      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber,
      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue
    }
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!clauseDetails),
    rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: ri!i18nData,
      bundleKey: a!match(
        value: {},
        whenTrue: and(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!alternateValue),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!deviation)
        ),
        then: "vld_DuplicateDeviationWithAltValue",
        whenTrue: rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!deviation),
        then: "vld_DuplicateDeviationWithoutAltValue",
        whenTrue: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!alternateValue),
        then: "vld_DuplicateAlternateClause",
        default: "vld_ClauseNumber"
      )
    ),
    null
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_getRefClauseAndClauseTextsFromHelperCDT
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!clauseHelper),
  null,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!clauseHelper,
    expression: {
      clause: recordType!AS GCM R Clause(
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber: fv!item.clauseNumber,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseTitle: fv!item.clauseTitle,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue: fv!item.alternateValue,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.deviation: fv!item.deviation,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.effectiveDate: fv!item.effectiveDate,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ucfSectionId:  fv!item.ucfSection.sectionId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refSourceId: fv!item.refSource.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refTypeId: fv!item.refType.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.refFormatId: fv!item.refFormat.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fillIn: fv!item.fillIn,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.editable: fv!item.editable,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.prescriptionNumber: fv!item.prescriptionNumber,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSupId: fv!item.fpSup.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crSupId: fv!item.crSup.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpRdId: fv!item.fpRd.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crRdId: fv!item.crRd.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSvcId: fv!item.fpSvc.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crSvcId: fv!item.crSvc.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpConId: fv!item.fpCon.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.crConId: fv!item.crCon.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.tmLhId: fv!item.tmLh.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.lmvId: fv!item.lmv.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.comSvcId: fv!item.comSvc.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.ddrId: fv!item.ddr.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.aeId: fv!item.ae.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.facId: fv!item.fac.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.indDelId: fv!item.indDel.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.trnId: fv!item.trn.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.sapId: fv!item.sap.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.utlSvcId: fv!item.utlSvc.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.cpCsId: fv!item.cpCs.refDataId,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.syncUpdatedBy: fv!item.syncUpdatedBy,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.syncUpdatedDatetime: fv!item.syncUpdatedDatetime,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.createdBy: fv!item.createdBy,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.createdDatetime: fv!item.createdDatetime,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.modifiedBy: fv!item.modifiedBy,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.modifiedDatetime: fv!item.modifiedDatetime,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.isActive: fv!item.isActive,
        recordType!AS GCM R Clause.additionalSections: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: {
              fv!item.commercialSection,
              fv!item.constructionSection
            },
            expression: recordType!AS GCM R Clause Section Mapping(
              recordType!AS GCM R Clause Section Mapping.sectionId: fv!item.sectionId
            )
          )
        }
      ),
      clauseText: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_Clause_Texts',
        value: {
          prescriptionText: fv!item.prescriptionText,
          clauseText: fv!item.clauseText,
          syncUpdatedBy: fv!item.syncUpdatedBy,
          syncUpdatedDatetime: fv!item.syncUpdatedDatetime,
          createdBy: fv!item.createdBy,
          createdDatetime: fv!item.createdDatetime,
          modifiedBy: fv!item.modifiedBy,
          modifiedDatetime: fv!item.modifiedDatetime,
          isActive: fv!item.isActive
        }
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    local!updates
  )
)

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_GRD_manageImportClauseGrid
_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!formValidations: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GCM_VD_importClauses(
      clausesToAdd: ri!finalImportedClauses,
      bundle: ri!bundle
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  local!ucfSectionChoices: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
    records: ri!clauseSectionChoice,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.contractFormatId,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_FORMAT_UCF
  ),
  local!commercialSectionChoices: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
    records: ri!clauseSectionChoice,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.contractFormatId,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_FORMAT_COMMERCIAL
  ),
  local!constructionSectionChoices: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
    records: ri!clauseSectionChoice,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.contractFormatId,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_FORMAT_CONSTRUCTION
  ),
  {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayout"(
      emptyGridMessage: "",
      headerCells: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!clauseFields,
          expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutHeaderCell"(
            label: if(
              fv!item.required,
              fv!item.label & " *",
              fv!item.label
            )
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutHeaderCell"(label: "")
      },
      columnConfigs: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!clauseFields,
          expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumnConfig"(width: "NARROW_PLUS")
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumnConfig"(width: "ICON")
      },
      rows: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!finalImportedClauses,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!clauseUniqueValidation: rule!AS_GCM_VD_duplicateValidationForClauseNumber(
            clauseNumber: fv!item.clauseNumber,
            clauseId: fv!item.clauseId,
            i18nData: ri!bundle,
            alternateValue: fv!item.alternateValue,
            deviation: fv!item.deviation
          ),
          local!duplicateRowValidation: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIfDuplicateExistsInArrayByIndex(
              array: merge(
                ri!finalImportedClauses.clauseNumber,
                ri!finalImportedClauses.alternateValue,
                ri!finalImportedClauses.deviation
              ),
              index: fv!index,
              skipNulls: true,
              caseSensitive: true()
            ),
            "You cannot have multiple items with the same clause number, alternate value and deviation",
            {}
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridRowLayout"(
            contents: {
              /*Clause Number*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[1],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[1],
                value: fv!item.clauseNumber,
                validations: {
                  local!clauseUniqueValidation,
                  local!duplicateRowValidation
                },
                saveInto: fv!item.clauseNumber,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[1],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[1]
              ),
              /*Title*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[2],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[2],
                value: fv!item.clauseTitle,
                saveInto: fv!item.clauseTitle,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[2],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[2]
              ),
              /*Alternate Value*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[3],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[3],
                value: fv!item.alternateValue,
                saveInto: fv!item.alternateValue,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[3],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[3],
                validations: {
                  local!clauseUniqueValidation,
                  local!duplicateRowValidation
                }
              ),
              /*Deviation*/
              rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[4],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[4],
                choiceLabels: {
                  "",
                  ""
                },
                choiceValues: { true(), false() },
                value: fv!item.deviation,
                saveInto: fv!item.deviation,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                choiceLayout: "COMPACT",
                validations: {
                  if(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(fv!item.deviation),
                    local!clauseUniqueValidation,
                    {}
                  ),
                  local!duplicateRowValidation
                },

              ),
              /*Type*/
              rule!AS_GCM_CP_refDataField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[5],
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[5],
                value: fv!item.refType.refDataId,
                saveInto: a!save(
                  fv!item.refType,
                  rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
                    records: ri!refData,
                    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
                    value: save!value
                  )
                ),
                refData: ri!refData,
                refType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_TYPE,
                placeholderLabel: ""
              ),
              /*Source*/
              rule!AS_GCM_CP_refDataField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[6],
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[6],
                value: fv!item.refSource.refDataId,
                saveInto: a!save(
                  fv!item.refSource,
                  rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
                    records: ri!refData,
                    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
                    value: save!value
                  )
                ),
                refData: ri!refData,
                refType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_SOURCE,
                placeholderLabel: ""
              ),
              /*UCF Section*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_dropdownField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[7],
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[7],
                choiceLabels: local!ucfSectionChoices[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionLabel],
                choiceValues: local!ucfSectionChoices[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionId],
                placeholder: "",
                value: fv!item.ucfSection.sectionId,
                saveInto: a!save(
                  fv!item.ucfSection,
                  rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
                    records: local!ucfSectionChoices,
                    field: recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionId,
                    value: save!value
                  )
                )
              ),
              /*Commercial Section*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_dropdownField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[8],
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[8],
                choiceLabels: local!commercialSectionChoices[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionLabel],
                choiceValues: local!commercialSectionChoices[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionId],
                placeholder: "",
                value: fv!item.commercialSection.sectionId,
                saveInto: fv!item.commercialSection.sectionId
              ),
              /*Construction Section*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_dropdownField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[9],
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[9],
                choiceLabels: local!constructionSectionChoices[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionLabel],
                choiceValues: local!constructionSectionChoices[recordType!AS GCM R Section.sectionId],
                placeholder: "",
                value: fv!item.constructionSection.sectionId,
                saveInto: fv!item.constructionSection.sectionId
              ),
              /*Effective Date*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[10],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[10],
                value: fv!item.effectiveDate,
                validations: {
                  rule!AS_GCM_VD_validationForSpecialCharacters(
                    text: fv!item.effectiveDate,
                    i18nData: ri!bundle,
                    labelName: ri!clauseFields.label[10]
                  )
                },
                saveInto: fv!item.effectiveDate,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[10],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[10]
              ),
              /*Included By*/
              rule!AS_GCM_CP_refDataField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[11],
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[11],
                value: fv!item.refFormat.refDataId,
                saveInto: a!save(
                  fv!item.refFormat,
                  rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
                    records: ri!refData,
                    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
                    value: save!value
                  )
                ),
                refData: ri!refData,
                refType: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_FORMAT,
                placeholderLabel: ""
              ),
              /*Fill Ins*/
              rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[12],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[12],
                choiceLabels: {
                  "",
                  ""
                },
                choiceValues: { true(), false() },
                value: fv!item.fillin,
                saveInto: fv!item.fillin,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                choiceLayout: "COMPACT"
              ),
              /*Editable*/
              rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[13],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[13],
                choiceLabels: {
                  "",
                  ""
                },
                choiceValues: { true(), false() },
                value: fv!item.editable,
                saveInto: fv!item.editable,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                choiceLayout: "COMPACT"
              ),
              /*Status*/
              rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[14],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[14],
                choiceLabels: {
                  "",
                  ""
                },
                choiceValues: { true(), false() },
                value: fv!item.isActive,
                saveInto: fv!item.isActive,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                choiceLayout: "COMPACT"
              ),
              /*Prescription Number*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_textField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[15],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[15],
                value: fv!item.prescriptionNumber,
                saveInto: fv!item.prescriptionNumber,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[15],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[15]
              ),
              /*Prescription Text*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_paragraphField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[16],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[16],
                value: fv!item.prescriptionText,
                saveInto: fv!item.prescriptionText,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[16],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[16]
              ),
              /*Clause Text*/
              rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_INP_paragraphField(
                label: ri!clauseFields.label[17],
                required: ri!clauseFields.required[17],
                value: fv!item.clauseText,
                saveInto: fv!item.clauseText,
                labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                characterLimit: ri!clauseFields.characterLimit[17],
                showCharacterCount: ri!clauseFields.showCharacterCount[17]
              ),
              rule!AS_CO_DSP_removeIcon(
                caption: "",
                saveInto: a!save(
                  ri!finalImportedClauses,
                  remove(ri!finalImportedClauses, fv!index)
                ),
                altText: ""
              )
            }
          )
        )
      ),
      rowHeader: 1
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
      validations: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayFormValidations(
        validationMessages: local!formValidations
      ),
      marginBelow: "NONE"
    )
  }
)

key represents a unique value for each map to identify
column represents the column header name in FAR Matrix
field represents the field to map with in record

NOTE: DO NOT UPDATE key in the below map since it is referenced in multiple places. Run all the testcases before saving any changes in this rule.
*/

  a!map(
    key: "provisionOrClause",

  ),
  a!map(

  ),
  a!map(
    key: "fpSvc",
    column: "FP SVC",
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.fpSvcId
  ),
  a!map(
    key: "crSvc",

  a!map(
    key: "fpCon",

  a!map(
